text: O vy, yaki uviruvaly! Ne zipsuyte mylostyni vashoyi dokorom ta obrazoyu, nache toy, khto vytratyv yakes聞 mayno na pozhertvu zadlya toho, shchob pobachyly tse lyudy. Adzhe vin ne uviruvav u Allaha ta Ostanniy Den聞. Yoho prykladom ye slyz聞ka skelya, vkryta zemleyu. Ta os聞 zmochyv yiyi doshch, i lyshylasya skelya ta chystoyu. Nemaye u nykh zhodnoyi syly nad tym, shcho otrymaly vony! Allah ne vede pryamym shlyakhom neviruyuchykh lyudey
